citeinfo.origin: National Atlas of the United States and the United States Geological Survey
citeinfo.title: U.S. National Atlas Airports

descript.abstract: U.S. National Atlas Airports represents airports in the United States, Puerto Rico, and U.S. Virgin Islands with airport passenger enplanements of greater than or equal to 250 passengers per year.
descript.purpose: U.S. National Atlas Airports provides information about the locations and enplanements of airports for conducting geographic analysis on national and large regional scales.
descript.supplinf: Largest scale when displaying the data: 1:2,000,000.

cntinfo.cntinst:
In the United States: Please contact Technical Support by telephone (voice) between 6:00 a.m. and 6:00 p.m. Pacific time, Monday through Friday, by dialing 909-793-3774; facsimile (fax) available at 909-792-0960; electronic mail (e-mail) support@esri.com; or visit http://support.esri.com
Outside the United States,Please consult http://gis.esri.com/intldist/contactint.cfm.

idinfo.native: Microsoft Windows NT Version 4.0 (Build 1381) Service Pack 6; ESRI ArcCatalog 8.1.1.649

dataqual.logic: No duplicate features are present. The shapefile is exported using Avenue request ExportClean. This request verifies and enforces the correctness of shapes.
dataqual.complete: After processing, the data set is checked for drawing display and number of records and file sizes compared with source materials.

horizpa.horizpar: The horizontal positional accuracy is unknown.

citeinfo.origin: National Atlas of the United States and the United States Geological Survey
citeinfo.title: nationalatlas.gov? ?Airports
citeinfo.othercit: The data set was downloaded from the web site in 2000.

procstep.procdesc:
[Date: 1998] Data from the National Transportation Atlas Databases 1997 (NTAD97) CD-ROM were obtained from the Department of Transportation. Using the airport.pnt and airport.t01 files on the CD-ROM, airports with passenger enplanement of greater than or equal to 250 passengers per year were selected to create a point coverage to which the following attributes were attached: airport location identifier, name of airport, name of State, State FIPS code, Air Carrier Activity Information System airports, and Total Enplanement. The data were converted to shapefile format for use in National Atlas applications and for distribution to the public.
[Date: 19990216] Airports for Puerto Rico and the U.S. Virgin Islands were added. Airport names were changed from all upper case and no period after initials to lower case and period after initials. For example, LYNDON B JOHNSON is now Lyndon B. Johnson.

The following steps were performed by ESRI: Downloaded the ArcView Shapefile version of the data, airprtx020.tar.gz, from http://www.nationalatlas.gov/atlasftp.html and extracted it. Removed unneeded attributes. Created projection file (.prj). Ran ArcView Avenue request ExportClean, and created spatial indices.
The original shape file was imported to an ArcSDE Layer.

altsys.altenc: Explicit elevation coordinate included with horizontal coordinates

enttyp.enttypd: The points represent locations where aircraft take off and land in the United States, Puerto Rico, and U.S. Virgin Islands.
enttyp.enttypds: National Atlas of the United States and the United States Geological Survey

attr.attrdef: The name or identification for the airport
attr.attrdefs: National Atlas of the United States and the United States Geological Survey

codesetd.codesets: U.S. Department of Transportation, Bureau of Transportation Statistics

attr.attrdef: The total enplanements during calendar year 1994 (the sum of large certified, commuter, air taxi, foreign, and in-transit enplanements).
attr.attrdefs: Air Carrier Activity Information System, Federal Aviation Administration.

edom.edomvd: All airports in this data set have airport passenger enplanements of greater than or equal to 250 passengers per year.
edom.edomvds: National Atlas of the United States and the United States Geological Survey.

distinfo.techpreq: To use this data requires software that supports ArcView GIS shapefiles.

metainfo.metstdn: FGDC Content Standards for Digital Geospatial Metadata
